Package dr.inference.markovjumps

Interface Summary
MarkovJumpsRegisterAcceptor  
 

Class Summary
MarkovJumpsCore  
StateChange A class to represent a state-change in a continuous-time Markov chain.
StateHistory A class to represent the complete state history of a continuous-time Markov chain in the interval [0,T].
SubordinatedProcess A class to represent a Poisson process and discrete-time Markov chain that subordinate a continuous-time Markov chain in the interval [0,T].
UniformizedStateHistory A class to represent a complete state history of a continuous-time Markov chain in the interval [0,T] simulated using the Uniformization Method

This work is supported by NSF grant 0856099

Minin VN and Suchard MA (2008) Counting labeled transitions in continous-time Markov models of evolution.
 

Enum Summary
MarkovJumpsType  
 

Exception Summary
